title: I need help dudes and the other gender
content: I am trying to get into PES rr campus through management and I was wondering how much it would cost or how exactly it works

comments.body: RR CSE @64L in total, which ain't worth.....you will regret one fine day....if you join via management.....
bro it was 44 when i joined why tf they need 20 extra lakhs
pes isn't worth the pessat or jee fee, let alone paying for a management seat
So what exactly are my optimal options
If I did terribly ass in jee and kcet what choice am I left with
Yeah, it's 48L for CSE RR for me. But wait, 64L for which academic yr? For 2025 starting they asked 48L ðŸ’€
I had one source who already joined for 2025 batch along with my 1st yr classmates who all joined for 64L
Other options? Cause I am lost
How much would that cost overall?Â
A person I know pays around 45 lakhs and bms is top 3 in karnataka
If 64 lakhs is something u can spend without worrying and u have no better  choice then join
Damn bro, I joined in jan, but admissions started last year July, fees must have been lower then ðŸ’€
